title: A top Goldman Sachs portfolio manager on 3 types of tech stocks to buy on the dip—and 2 to avoid - Fortune
content: A top Goldman Sachs portfolio manager on 3 types of tech stocks to buy on the dip—and 2 to avoid  Fortune
description: "We think it's an attractive entry point for any investor kind of seeking to buy tech over the long term," Sung Cho, a portfolio manager at Goldman Sachs Asset Management, tells Fortune.
